data.title: COUNTRY INN & SUITES BY RADISSON, COUNCIL BLUFFS, IA 3⋆ ::: COUNCIL BLUFFS, IA ::: COMPARE HOTEL RATES
data.meta_description: Country Inn & Suites By Radisson, Council Bluffs, Ia Council Bluffs - 3 star hotel. Country Inn & Suites By Radisson, Council Bluffs, Ia is located in Council Bluffs, within 10 minutes' drive of RailsWest Railroad Museum & HO Model Display, …
data.text:
Country Inn & Suites By Radisson, Council Bluffs, Ia is located in Council Bluffs, within 10 minutes' drive of RailsWest Railroad Museum & HO Model Display, and offers a swimming pool. This inn features both Wi-Fi throughout the property and public parking on site.

The accommodation is situated about 15 km from Eppley airport and in proximity to Mid-America Center Arena. The 3-star hotel is at a distance of 3.6 km from Omaha's Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium and merely 5 minutes' walk from Horseshoe Council Bluffs. Omaha Children's Museum is approximately 10 minutes' drive from this property.

There are 129 comfortable rooms at Country Inn & Suites By Radisson, Council Bluffs, Ia, some of them have a fireplace and sound-proofed windows, and modern facilities such as complimentary wireless internet and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They have a comfortable interior. A bathtub and a shower, along with such comforts as hairdryers and bath sheets, are also provided.

Every day the Country Inn & Suites By Radisson, Council Bluffs, Ia serves a complimentary buffet breakfast, including cold buffet dishes, fresh fruits, and waffles. Village Square Buffet pampers guests with American dishes and lies within walking distance of this accommodation.
